items.title: Jim Cramer Calls J. M. Smucker’s Recent Quarterly Report “Horrendous”
items.description: The J. M. Smucker Company (NYSE:SJM) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. During the episode, Cramer discussed the impact of the company’s acquisition of Hostess Brands. He said: “Meanwhile, usually strong stocks like Colgate or Procter & Gamble, they can’t get traction at all. Hey, two weeks ago, we […]
